
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(library-profiling-solomon)
target_compile_options(library-profiling-solomon PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
include(FindProtobuf)
find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
include_directories(${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS})
message(boroda "${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS}")
target_link_libraries(library-profiling-solomon PUBLIC
${Protobuf_LIBRARIES}
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-library-profiling
  yt-yt-core
  yt-core-http
  library-cpp-cgiparam
  cpp-monlib-metrics
  monlib-encode-prometheus
  monlib-encode-spack
  monlib-encode-json
  cpp-yt-threading
)
target_proto_messages(library-profiling-solomon PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/sensor_dump.proto
)
target_sources(library-profiling-solomon PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/cube.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/exporter.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/percpu.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/producer.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/registry.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/remote.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/sensor.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/sensor_service.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/sensor_set.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/profiling/solomon/tag_registry.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(library-profiling-solomon
  ./
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(library-profiling-solomon
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/
)
